description:
This is a newly renovated 1 bedroom 1 bathroom on the 5th floor of a quiet elevator building. The bedroom has a queen sized bed and the living room has a full sized pull out sofa. Both TVs are equipped with Apple TV. There is a 24 hour doorman, making the building very secure and safe.

This is a newly renovated 1 bedroom 1 bathroom on the 5th floor of a quiet elevator building. The bedroom has a queen sized bed and the living room has a full sized pull out sofa. Both TVs are equipped with Apple TV. There is a trash chute on the floor. There is a 24 hour doorman, making the building very secure and safe.

There is a 24 hour laundry room located on the 3rd floor

Within walking distance to plenty of restaurants and bars as well as an AMC movie theater right around the corner. The subway and bus are both also a few blocks away.

Garage parking is available for a fee and metered street parking is also available
name: Newly Renovated & Sunny 1BR in Murray Hill!
review: Kylie was a great host! The place was clean, small, and cozy! Perfect for a NYC visit! Only thing is if you plan to watch tv and be in the room for a little while during your stat, learn to use Apple TV! We had trouble with it. Otherwise, great stay!
